reviewText: It's rare to find a video like this where you like every single exercise. I'm an avid long time exerciser,who now works out in the am on weekdays when I'm less tired. This is a nice one to add 5-20 minutes of abs on to the end of an aerobic workout. It's broke out into 5 minute segments of classic, pilates, core, and dynamic. The only strange thing is the 1st and third one they wear shoes so you have to pick them out of order. I saw a difference right away and the more you do them the better you are at them. I'm telling you you'll like every move.
